languages.text: "Стратегическая рекомендация: анализ показал, что сообщество нелюдей разобщено конфликтами. Манипуляция разногласиями ксеносов может привести к обретению временных союзников, обладающих техническими средствами для возвращения единицы {name} фон Валанциус в пространство реальности".

"Strategic recommendation: analysis has shown that the non-human community is racked by strife. Exploiting the xenos' mutual differences can result in temporary alliances that will provide the technological means of returning the unit {name} von Valancius to realspace."
languages.original_text: "Стратегическая рекомендация: анализ показал, что сообщество нелюдей разобщено конфликтами. Манипуляция разногласиями ксеносов может привести к обретению временных союзников, обладающих техническими средствами для возвращения единицы {name} фон Валанциус в пространство реальности".

traits.locale_text: "Strategic recommendation: analysis has shown that the non-human community is racked by strife. Exploiting the xenos' mutual differences can result in temporary alliances that will provide the technological means of returning the unit {name} von Valancius to real space."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Strategic recommendation: analysis has shown that the non-human community is racked by strife. Exploiting the xenos' mutual differences can result in temporary alliances that will provide the technological means of returning the unit {name} von Valancius to real space."

traits.locale_text: "Strategic recommendation: analysis has shown that the non-human community is racked by strife. Exploiting the xenos' mutual differences can result in temporary alliances that will provide the technological means of returning the unit {name} von Valancius to realspace."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “战略性建议：分析表明，此处的非人类社区正处于纷争之中。建议利用异形之间的相互差异，组成临时联盟，并从该联盟处获得技术手段，让{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯这个单位返回真实世界。”
languages.original_text: "Strategic recommendation: analysis has shown that the non-human community is racked by strife. Exploiting the xenos' mutual differences can result in temporary alliances that will provide the technological means of returning the unit {name} von Valancius to realspace."

traits.locale_text: “战略性建议：分析表明，此处的非人类社区正处于纷争之中。建议利用异形之间的相互差异，组成临时联盟，并从该联盟处获得技术手段，让{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯这个单位返回真实世界。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Recomendación estratégica: el análisis muestra que la comunidad no humana está llena de conflictos. Explotar la mutua animadversión de los xenos puede producir alianzas temporales que proporcionen los medios tecnológicos para devolver la unidad {name} von Valancius al espacio real».
languages.original_text: "Strategic recommendation: analysis has shown that the non-human community is racked by strife. Exploiting the xenos' mutual differences can result in temporary alliances that will provide the technological means of returning the unit {name} von Valancius to realspace."

traits.locale_text: «Recomendación estratégica: el análisis muestra que la comunidad no humana está llena de conflictos. Explotar la mutua animadversión de los xenos puede producir alianzas temporales que proporcionen los medios tecnológicos para devolver la unidad {name} von Valancius al espacio real».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「戦略的提言。分析の結果、非人間社会は争いに明け暮れていることがわかった。異種族の相互の相違を利用することで、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスユニットをリアルスペースに帰還させる技術的手段を提供する一時的な同盟を結ぶことができるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Strategic recommendation: analysis has shown that the non-human community is racked by strife. Exploiting the xenos' mutual differences can result in temporary alliances that will provide the technological means of returning the unit {name} von Valancius to realspace."

traits.locale_text: 「戦略的提言。分析の結果、非人間社会は争いに明け暮れていることがわかった。異種族の相互の相違を利用することで、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスユニットをリアルスペースに帰還させる技術的手段を提供する一時的な同盟を結ぶことができるだろう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Strategische Empfehlung: Die Analyse zeigt, dass die nicht-menschliche Gemeinschaft zerstritten ist. Die Differenzen zwischen den Xenos auszunutzen, kann zu temporären Allianzen führen. Diese können die technologischen Mittel bereitstellen, um die Einheit {name} von Valancius in den Realraum zurückzubringen."
languages.original_text: "Strategic recommendation: analysis has shown that the non-human community is racked by strife. Exploiting the xenos' mutual differences can result in temporary alliances that will provide the technological means of returning the unit {name} von Valancius to realspace."

traits.locale_text: "Strategische Empfehlung: Die Analyse zeigt, dass die nicht-menschliche Gemeinschaft zerstritten ist. Die Differenzen zwischen den Xenos auszunutzen, kann zu temporären Allianzen führen. Diese können die technologischen Mittel bereitstellen, um die Einheit {name} von Valancius in den Realraum zurückzubringen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Recommandations stratégiques : l'analyse a montré que la communauté non humaine est en proie au conflit. L'exploitation des différences mutuelles des xénos pourrait permettre de nouer des alliances temporaires qui offriront à l'unité {name} von Valancius les moyens technologiques nécessaires pour retourner dans l'espace réel. »
languages.original_text: "Strategic recommendation: analysis has shown that the non-human community is racked by strife. Exploiting the xenos' mutual differences can result in temporary alliances that will provide the technological means of returning the unit {name} von Valancius to realspace."

traits.locale_text: « Recommandations stratégiques : l'analyse a montré que la communauté non humaine est en proie au conflit. L'exploitation des différences mutuelles des xénos pourrait permettre de nouer des alliances temporaires qui offriront à l'unité {name} von Valancius les moyens technologiques nécessaires pour retourner dans l'espace réel. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Strategic recommendation: analysis has shown that the non-human community is racked by strife. Exploiting the xenos' mutual differences can result in temporary alliances that will provide the technological means of returning the unit  von Valancius to realspace."

languages.text: "Stratejik öneri: Analizler, insan dışı toplumunda iç çatışmalar yaşadığını göstermekte. Zenoların anlaşmazlıklarından fayda sağlamak, geçici ittifaklara yol açabilir. Bunlar da {name} von Valancius biriminin gerçekuzaya dönmesini sağlayacak teknolojik olanaklara erişmesine olanak tanıyabilir."
languages.original_text: "Strategic recommendation: analysis has shown that the non-human community is racked by strife. Exploiting the xenos' mutual differences can result in temporary alliances that will provide the technological means of returning the unit {name} von Valancius to realspace."

traits.locale_text: "Stratejik öneri: Analizler, insan dışı toplulukların iç çatışmalar yaşadığını göstermekte. Zenoların birbirleriyle çatıştıkları noktalardan fayda sağlamak, geçici ittifaklara yol açabilir, bu da {name} von Valancius biriminin, gerçekuzaya dönebilmesini sağlayacak teknolojik olanaklara erişmesine olanak tanıyabilir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
